name: Link
storyline: The Professor and his assistant Linda are going to the wildest world tour, which is filled with a lot of difficulties and adventures. Their main goal is to explore and collect numerous collections of magical artifacts from all over the world. Little but brave and agile Pets are hurry to help Linda and the Professor in their efforts to solve the puzzles and avoid fiends! It’s a lot of fun! Link, match, connect, blast – just do whatever you like! It’s not like in ordinary zoo games, pets puzzles are truly mind breakers!
summary:
WELCOME TO THE FUNNIEST PETS PUZZLE ADVENTURE GAME!

Start an exciting adventure in the cutest animal puzzle matching game! Join the Professor and his charming assistant Linda on their world tour! Help them outsmart cute funny animals and discover ancient legends! Search for rare and unique artifacts by playing with curious pets, connecting them together in lines as long as possible. Play with little funny animals, make powerful blasts, and help collect precious items!

Ready for a wild journey? Start playing the funniest adventure of your life and make a line!
